Title: Relates to the approval of contracts during a state disaster emergency
Summary: Requires that within thirty days following the execution of a state disaster emergency contract or an exempted contract, such state agency, department, board, officer, commission, state authority, or institution shall submit certain information to the office of the state comptroller, with redactions made by the contracting entity which shall be made available on its public website; defines terms; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง149, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to approval of contracts during a state disaster emergency or in accordance with any other provision of law suspending approval
